dcterms:creator: Ö. Yıldırım
P. Pławiak
R.-S. Tan
U. R. Acharya
dcterms:description: A dataset of ECG signal segments labeled as either 'Normal' or 'Atrial Fibrillation (AFib)', which is a major kind of irregular heartbeat that can lead to heart failures and possibly death.
dcterms:title: AFib classification dataset

dcterms:creator: D. Anguita
A. Ghio
L. Oneto
X. Parra
J. L. Reyes-Ortiz
dcterms:description: A dataset for human activity recognition using smartphones, containing examples collected from motion sensors such as accelerometers and gyroscopes while performing six different activities.
dcterms:title: HAR dataset (Human Activity Recognition dataset)
